name: Noodles Carving: Fix Everything
description:
Carve anything you desire and make noodles carving art.

Noodles Carving is similar to wood carving and wood shop

How To Play:
•Carve noodles and match it to the given shape.
•Cut, polish, paint and fix broken objects.

Features :
• Make various noodles designs.
• Relax with this noodles cutting – noodles carving cutter game.
• Make best and unique shapes out of noodles using chisels and paint.
• Noodles carving lathe.
• Cool graphical visualization.
• Smooth and unique gameplay.

Noodles cutting machine is ready to use.
Install Now and enjoy it !
